name: Abdullah Saeed
title: Front-End Developer & TA
description: Designing the TEP website experience and supporting Computer Technology lab groups.
bio: Abdullah leads the visual refresh of the TEP website, focusing on responsive layouts, reusable components, and inclusive content. He also mentors students in the Computer Technology course, helping them troubleshoot hardware and web assignments.
